attributes.action: Change speed limits to metric units
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A modern country needs to shake off the anachronistic baggage of 'imperial' units of distance and speed. These hamper transport operations between UK and Europe and give the country a quaint backward image that harms our industry. Miles should have been abandoned in the 1970s and there is no excuse for further delay.
